name: VisibleCheckpoints
description: Makes your checkpoints show up on the progress bar

issues.info: When reporting issues, please create a new one on the repository with the correct information, such as a crashlog, what you were doing to cause the issue, screenshots, videos, etc.

progress-bar-opacity.name: Checkpoint Opacity
progress-bar-opacity.description: Opacity for the checkpoints on the progress bar (in RGBA format).

progress-bar-crowding.name: Prevent Crowding
progress-bar-crowding.description: Prevents checkpoints from rendering too close to eachother on the progress bar.
